title: Motion pictures produced by American Mutoscope and Biograph Company, 1906. [Pt. 1]
brief_description:
Compilation of silent motion pictures produced by Amwerican Mutoscope and Biograph Company.
Contents: The Silver wedding (1906)—The Black hand (1906)—The Paymaster (1906)
Restored from the Library of Congress paper prints.
